arts.ttl: John Eustace shares Ryan Nyambe injury update and half time message to Derby County players
arts.sum: It was such a change in approach so early into the second half, but Eustace reasoned that he didn't dramatically alter his side's set-up all too much at the half-time interval, instead instructing his players to retain possession better in order to hurt their visitors in the final third. John Eustace has confirmed that Derby County defender Ryan Nyambe has suffered another hamstring injury and scans on Thursday are set to determine how severe the latest setback will be.

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-1 Crystal Palace: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Derby County Premier League record still possible for Saints
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Wednesday's Premier League clash between Southampton and Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings as Forysth shines in fourth straight win
arts.sum: Ryan Nyambe, who was John Eustace's sole change to the starting XI, intended to return a high ball back into the Preston danger zone after they'd only half-cleared a corner, but his attempt looped up in the air and granted North End forward Milutin Osmajic a run on goal from deep. After an admittedly underwhelming first period, the Rams struck twice in the space of four second half minutes thanks to fine goals from Craig Forsyth and Jerry Yates and the visitors never recovered.

arts.ttl: Derby County seal fourth straight win to climb out of relegation zone
arts.sum: Ryan Nyambe, who was John Eustace's sole change to the starting XI, intended to return a high ball back into the Preston danger zone after they'd only half-cleared a corner, but his attempt looped up in the air and granted North End forward Milutin Osmajic a run on goal from deep. After an admittedly underwhelming first period, the Rams struck twice in the space of four second half minutes thanks to fine goals from Craig Forsyth and Jerry Yates and the visitors never recovered.

arts.ttl: How to watch Derby County vs Preston North End - Live stream and TV channel for Championship clash - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: Derby vs Preston is also being broadcast in the United States where fans will be able to watch the game live via Paramount + nd CBS Sports Golazo channels. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: Derby County rookie lifts lid on 'hectic' debut after 140-mile journey
arts.sum: Derby County goalkeeper Rohan Luthra says he loved the first game of his emergency loan spell with Spennymoor Town – even if he only arrived an hour before kick-off. That brought an end to a whirlwind day which started at training with the Rams and ended up three hours away at Brewery Field in County Durham.

arts.ttl: Championship manager reveals Derby County scouting mission as relegation battle intensifies
arts.sum: Hull City's Ruben Selles has admitted he'll be keeping a close eye on Derby County's crucial clash with Preston North End this Wednesday, as his side anxiously await the result. Despite consistently stating that other results are of little concern as he can't control them, Selles admits he'll be taking a special interest in the East Midlands action given Hull face Derby in their final home game at the MKM Stadium on April 26.

arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Southampton boss Ivan Juric has challenged his players to prove they are not the “worst team in the history of the Premier League” as relegation looms.
